name: Lectura PQA
Real Time Parameters IEC754 to Float
Harmonics - Power Quality
func:
msg.payload = {
    "THD_V1(V12)"   : msg.payload[0]/100,
    "THD_V2(V31)"   : msg.payload[1]/100,
    "THD_V3(V23)"   : msg.payload[2]/100,
    "THD_avg"       : msg.payload[3]/100,
    "THD_I1"        : msg.payload[4]/100,
    "THD_I2"        : msg.payload[5]/100,
    "THD_I3"        : msg.payload[6]/100,
    "THD_Iavg"      : msg.payload[7]/100
}
return msg;

name: Logo / Clock
Principal
format:
<script>
    (function(scope) {
        scope.$watch('msg', function(data) {
            var elem = document.getElementById("headerStatus")
            if(elem !== null) {
                elem.className = data.payload;
                elem.innerHTML = data.payload;
            }
        });
    })(scope);
</script>
